item.title: IMC 以 3500 万美元出售巴西肯德基股份，成立合资企业
item.description: 巴西餐饮特许经营运营商 IMC 周三表示，该公司已与肯塔基食品智利有限公司（Kentucky Foods Chile Limitada）签署了一项具有约束力的协议，就 IMC 在巴西经营肯德基餐厅事宜成立一家合资企业。【原文：Brazilian restaurant franchise operator IMC said on Wednesday it has signed a binding agreement to create a joint venture with Kentucky Foods Chile Limitada regarding IMC's operations of KFC restaurants in Brazil.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布征收汽车进口关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三晚些时候表示，美国将对所有非本国制造的汽车实际征收 25% 的关税，并补充说，对进口到美国的汽车和轻型卡车征收的新关税将是永久性的。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said late on Wednesday the United States will effectively charge a 25% tariff on all cars not made in the country and added that the new tariffs on cars and light trucks imported into the United States will be permanent.】

item.title: 卡尼表示，加拿大将很快对特朗普的 "攻击 "做出反应，并可能征收关税
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周三表示，加拿大将很快对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的进口汽车新关税做出回应，并可能对美国采取报复性措施。【原文：Canada will soon respond to new tariffs on imported vehicles announced by U.S. President Donald Trump and could impose retaliatory measures against the United States, Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能给中国减免关税以达成 TikTok 协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他可能会给中国减少一点关税，以达成与中国拥有的 TikTok 相关的协议，同时他还补充说，如果不能就该社交媒体应用达成协议，他很可能会延长最后期限。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he may give China a little reduction in tariffs to get a deal related to Chinese-owned TikTok done while adding that he was likely to extend a deadline if an agreement over the social media app was not reached.】

item.title: 据 TechCrunch 报道，UnitedHealth 已从网站上删除有关 DEI 的内容
item.description: 据 TechCrunch 周三报道，联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）已从其网站上删除了大部分有关其多元化、公平和包容性（DEI）政策的内容。【原文：UnitedHealth Group has removed most mentions of its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) policies from its website, TechCrunch reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据 TechCrunch 报道，UnitedHealth 已从网站上删除有关 DEI 的内容
item.description: 据 TechCrunch 周三报道，联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）已从其网站上删除了大部分有关其多元化、公平和包容性（DEI）政策的内容。【原文：UnitedHealth Group has removed most mentions of its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) policies from its website, TechCrunch reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将对所有非美国制造的汽车征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三表示，美国将对所有非本国制造的汽车征收 25% 的关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday the United States will effectively charge a 25% tariff on all cars not made in the country.】

item.title: 交易日 "关税人 "大展拳脚，市场畏缩不前
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 申诉称，特朗普解雇从事 DEI 工作的联邦工作人员是非法的
item.description: 一群联邦雇员周三向美国劳工委员会提起集体诉讼，声称他们因参与实施多元化、公平和包容政策而被解雇，这侵犯了他们的宪法权利。【原文：A group of federal employees filed a class action complaint with a U.S. labor board on Wednesday claiming they were fired for their involvement in implementing diversity, equity and inclusion policies, in violation of their constitutional rights.】

item.title: 杰富瑞利润因债券交易和股票承销疲软而下降
item.description: 杰富瑞银行周三发布报告称，由于美国贸易政策变化和地缘政治动荡引发的不确定性，债券交易疲软，股市交易停滞，该行第一季度利润下降近 15%。【原文：Jefferies' first-quarter profit fell nearly 15%, the bank reported on Wednesday, as bond trading weakened and stock market deals were stalled due to uncertainty sparked by shifting U.S. trade policy and geopolitical turmoil.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长告诉福克斯新闻：乌克兰可能在下周签署经济协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，乌克兰可能在下周签署一项经济协议，如果有必要，唐纳德-特朗普总统将毫不犹豫地加强对俄罗斯的制裁。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday Ukraine may sign an economic deal next week and President Donald Trump will not hesitate to raise sanctions on Russia if the need arises.】

item.title: 木薯科学公司必须面对有关阿尔茨海默氏症药物的恶意起诉诉讼
item.description: 生物技术公司卡萨瓦科学公司（Cassava Sciences）周三未能结束医生和做空者对其即将停产的阿尔茨海默氏症试验性药物西姆非拉姆（simufilam）表示怀疑而提起的恶意诉讼。【原文：The biotechnology company Cassava Sciences failed on Wednesday to end a malicious prosecution lawsuit by doctors and short-sellers who expressed doubts about its experimental, soon-to-be-discontinued Alzheimer's drug simufilam.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 预计到 2029 年才能实现现金流正增长
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引一位知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 预计其现金流要到 2029 年才能转正。【原文：OpenAI is not expecting its cash flow to turn positive until 2029, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局今年将招聘 2000 名空中交通管制员，继续对波音公司进行严格监管
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）代理局长在周四向美国参议院一个小组提交的书面证词中表示，该局计划今年招聘 2000 名空中交通管制员学员，并对波音公司（Boeing BA.N）保持严格监管。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration plans to hire 2,000 air traffic controller trainees this year and maintain strict oversight of Boeing BA.N, the agency's acting administrator said in written testimony to be given to a U.S. Senate panel on Thursday.】

item.title: 波音-洛克希德公司的 "火神 "获准发射美国国家安全卫星
item.description: 美国太空部队周三表示，已批准波音公司和洛克希德-马丁公司的火神火箭为美国发射国家安全卫星。【原文：The U.S. Space Force said on Wednesday it has cleared Boeing and Lockheed Martin's Vulcan rocket to launch national security satellites for the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普关税阴影笼罩债务缠身的英国经济
item.description: 周三，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）成为笼罩在英国经济头上的最大威胁之一，英国的财政监督机构称，缓慢的经济增长和沉重的债务负担使英国特别容易受到他提议的关税的影响。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump emerged as one of the biggest threats hanging over the British economy on Wednesday, when the country's fiscal watchdog said slow growth and a heavy debt burden made it especially vulnerable to his proposed tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普的证券交易委员会人选承诺制定 "合理 "的加密货币法规
item.description: 根据参议院公开的准备证词，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的美国证券交易委员会主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周三承诺，在他的领导下，监管将有利于加密货币行业，并防止政治 "扼杀 "资本形成。【原文：Paul Atkins, President Donald Trump's pick to run the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, pledged on Wednesday that regulations under his leadership would benefit the crypto sector and prevent politics from "stifling" capital formation, according to prepared testimony made public by the Senate.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，收购公司围攻雀巢 50 亿欧元的水业务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，PAI Partners 和贝恩资本是考虑竞购雀巢水业务的收购公司之一，该业务在交易中的估值可能约为 50 亿欧元（53.8 亿美元）或更高。【原文：PAI Partners and Bain Capital are among the buyout firms considering bidding for Nestle's water business, which could be valued at about 5 billion euros ($5.38 billion) or more in a deal, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛的复活节套餐没有鸡蛋
item.description: 美国零售业巨头沃尔玛周三表示，在禽流感疫情导致鸡蛋短缺、价格飙升的情况下，沃尔玛今年的复活节餐食将不提供鸡蛋。【原文：Walmart will be skipping eggs in its Easter meal offer this year, the U.S. retail giant said on Wednesday, in the midst of shortages and sky-high prices spiked by the bird flu outbreak among poultry.】

item.title: 黑海协议不可能在短期内促进俄罗斯粮食出口
item.description: 分析师和业内人士周三表示，一项被华盛顿和莫斯科吹捧为全球粮食安全福音的放宽俄罗斯进入国际农产品市场限制的潜在协议不太可能产生什么直接影响。【原文：A potential deal to ease restrictions on Russia's access to international agricultural markets, touted by Washington and Moscow as a boon for global food security, is unlikely to have much immediate impact, analysts and industry sources said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，自马斯克收购以来，X 公司将首次实现年度广告收入增长
item.description: 研究公司 Emarketer 周三提供的数据显示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的社交媒体平台 X 自 2022 年被这位亿万富翁收购以来，今年将迎来广告收入增长的第一年。【原文：Elon Musk-owned social media platform X is poised for the company's first year of advertising revenue growth since its acquisition by the billionaire in 2022, data from research firm Emarketer showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：欧盟高官预计特朗普将征收约 20% 的关税
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，欧盟最高贸易谈判代表马罗什-谢夫乔维奇（Maroš Šefčovič）预计，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下周将对欧盟征收约20%的关税。【原文：The European Union's top trade negotiator Maroš Šefčovič expects U.S. President Donald Trump to hit the bloc with tariffs of about 20% next week, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 瑞士政党计划遏制瑞银投资银行，以此作为资本规则的交换条件
item.description: 一位资深立法者周三表示，作为旨在降低该行业风险的监管改革的一部分，瑞士的一个主要政党可能很快会提议对瑞银集团的投资银行活动设置上限。【原文：One of Switzerland's main political parties could soon propose capping UBS's investment banking activities as part of a regulatory overhaul aimed at making the sector less risky, a senior lawmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 圣路易斯联储穆萨莱姆称关税可能引发更持久的通胀
item.description: 圣路易斯联储主席阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆（Alberto Musalem）周三表示，美国通胀率将停滞在美联储2%的目标之上，甚至在短期内进一步上升的风险已经增加，进口税的上升可能会引发更持久的物价压力。【原文：Risks have increased that U.S. inflation will stall above the Federal Reserve's 2% target or even rise further in the near term, with rising import taxes potentially triggering more persistent price pressures, St. Louis Fed president Alberto Musalem said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称可口可乐装瓶商遭到欧盟反垄断监管机构突袭
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士说，可口可乐的装瓶商在本月早些时候遭到了欧盟反垄断监管机构的突袭。【原文：Coca Cola bottlers were raided by EU antitrust regulators earlier this month, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普可能利用 2019 年的调查作为对汽车进口征收关税的理由
item.description: 行业专家和前美国官员表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府很可能会利用他在第一个任期内完成的一项调查来为他所说的即将实施的汽车关税辩护。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is likely to use an investigation completed during his first term in office to justify auto tariffs that he says are imminent, industry experts and former U.S. officials said.】

item.title: 分析师称微软放弃在美国和欧洲租赁更多数据中心
item.description: 道明证券（TD Cowen）分析师周三表示，由于供过于求，相对于当前的需求预测，微软在过去六个月中放弃了将在美国和欧洲使用 2 千兆瓦电力的数据中心项目。【原文：Microsoft has abandoned data center projects set to use 2 gigawatts of electricity in the U.S. and Europe in the last six months due to an oversupply relative to its current demand forecast, TD Cowen analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于担心关税，意大利葡萄酒对美国的出口 "停滞不前
item.description: 贸易集团Federvini周三表示，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统可能在未来几周内征收关税的不确定性，意大利葡萄酒和烈酒对美国的出口正在停滞。【原文：Italian wine and spirits exports to the United States are stalling due to the uncertainty over possible tariffs that President Donald Trump could impose in the coming weeks, trade group Federvini said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普准备最快于周三宣布汽车关税政策
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）援引知情人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备最快于周三宣布有关汽车征税的消息。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is readying an announcement on auto levies as soon as Wednesday, Bloomberg News reported citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表与中国副总理就贸易紧张局势表达 "坦率 "关切
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备进一步提高对中国进口商品的关税之际，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）的办公室表示，格里尔在一次介绍性会晤中与中国国务院副总理何立峰就贸易问题进行了 "坦诚 "的会谈。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer held "candid" talks with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on trade issues during an introductory meeting, Greer's office said as U.S. President Donald Trump prepares to raise tariffs on Chinese imports further.】
